name: Mystery Match
description:
Play Mystery Match today — a 1930s puzzle adventure loved by millions.

With over 1,700 levels, this Match 3 mystery weaves a thrilling tale that will keep you guessing every step of the way!

Join Detective Emma Fairfax as she adventures across the globe, discovering clues, solving puzzles, and seeking the truth. Be wary of friends and foes alike, as danger lurks in the shadows. Switch and match jewels to uncover hidden objects and unlock Puzzle Boxes, as you unravel the mystery!

Escape into a world of intrigue, install Mystery Match for free today!


• Travel the world; from the streets of London to the shadows of Rome!

• Enjoy 5 unique puzzle types, and lots of new content to keep you on your toes!

• Be the ultimate detective as you find hidden objects and outsmart shadowy foes!

• Experience enchanting Art Deco environments and thrilling period drama!

• Invite your Facebook Friends, and share the adventure today!


It's time to test your detective skills, as you embark on this whirlwind adventure! Can you discover the secret behind the mystery… before it's too late?
